title: PLEASE READ Vertical ads…. Still break YouTube
text: Wrote a review a few days ago about how vertical ads break YouTube and force you to watch the video vertically, and when you try to minimize the video, it doesn’t work. I have to restart my app, find the video again, and pray I don’t get a broken ad. It’s very sad. Please fix this. Months later this is still an issue. It’s extremely frustrating that YouTube doesn’t care to fix issues that prevent the app from working as functioned. Incompetence at its best. UPDATE: all these issues are still apparent and now when you accidentally open the capture function while watching a video, it destroys the audio quality and you have to restart the app- essentially a crash.

title: Needs more ads
text: Could use more ads and definitely make them all not able to be skipped.. also some of the ads are too short or not repetitive enough. The short ads make it difficult to have enough time to go to the restroom. Another idea would be to increase the size of the nag message about upgrading to YouTube plus.. make that full screen and oh make it so you can’t X it out and force it to stay at least 30 seconds.

title: Getting Error 400 Trying to reply
text:
I’ve tried to reply to a reply to me but then get an Error 400. Ok, I guess the joke is on me since it’s 4/1/2024.

Super Sensitive
3/27/24 Lately it seems that You Tube is especially sensitive and will skip on to something else when you are trying to watch something. It’s quite annoying. I don’t remember YT being that sensitive to movement. I hope there’s a fix to that. Title: Option to move the word “subscribe” around? 3/16/24 - wish we had the option to move the word “subscribe” around ‘cuz sometimes it blocks other things we do want to read. If there is a way, I’m not aware of it. I did try with my finger though but nothing moved. Not allowing comments on many of the videos:( 2/12/2024 - Ran across a Young Sheldon video clip talking about how it’s going to end and all and then says share your comments below. Um, no way to do that when You Tube has the comments turned off. What kind of monsters do you think we all are anyways? I wish instead of keeping the name Young Sheldon and killing off their dad, that maybe you just change the name of the show. I think The Cooper Family sounds pretty good, or The Coopers but you already have a similar sounding title with TheConners, tho I don’t really watch that but I would with the carry over of Sheldon’s Family. Please reconsider turning the comments back on. Is it a space issue? Otherwise, comments have been very helpful, if say, the viewer can’t recall which family member is singing a particular song. Hey, us commenters aren’t that evil. I don’t recall seeing any really bad or nasty comments.

title: Price Increase
text:
Premium is $12.99 and it's being upped to $18.99 for....what. 

????

Companies are so greedy. Unsubscribe from YouTube in iOS and subscribe directly on their website to avoid "fees"(ie, a price increase) thanks to Apple and their locked system. 

$18.99 a MONTH?? For what?? Just for peace of mind and no ads, which should be FREE?? Ridiculous.

title: I love YouTube
text: I am 60 years old and I am so grateful for YouTube ...I have been enjoying it now for about five years and I think it’s absolutely incredible. I have been able to find so many things of importance and then also things that are not so important. But the information is amazing that you can get from YouTube not to mention the entertainment. I don’t have TV in my house ...Who needs TV with YouTube ...I can even stay up on current events or go all the way back to watch Johnny Carson, the Beverly hillbillies just comfort food. I love it all🥰I can’t say enough ! thank you so much to the YouTube people that make it all happen. God bless you all especially in this time of the coronavirus with all of us shut in! I am grateful God bless you all
